overview: Where the Fourth Doctor left off, the Eighth Doctor comes to finish the job. With Romana and K9 by his side, they have to stop the evil Skagra. A remounted version of the abandoned Fourth Doctor serial, rewritten to feature the Eighth Doctor and fit in with the Big Finish audio drama continuity.
tagline: The Lost Adventure by Douglas Adams Dramatised in Full at Last!
title: Doctor Who: Shada
